review: Very good alternative to cable and worth the price.
author: ree

review: Great movies. It lacks You Tube easy access.  Looking at other ways to fill this gap.
author: Scott Orton

review: Works better than my smart TV with built in wifi in the other room.
author: Laurence Faucher

review: The Firestick is easy and quick to install. I ordered another one for my granddaughter and I'm thinking of getting more. If you have Netflix and/or Amazon Prime this is an excellent purchase!!
author: Lynn

review: Impressed : did not synch at first. Synched on 2nd set . And then worked on main sharp tv.Chromecast did not work on 2 tv'S. Sound off and picture poor.Only worked on tv where modem and router located. Fire stick much better. And remote a huge plus.
author: bob schechter

review: It stopped working after a couple of months. No matter where I plugged it in the device it would not function.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great going to get another one
author: Kenneth Chupella
